edu.blooddonor.geoAPI

Class DistanceListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.blooddonor.geoAPI.DistanceListActivity

  • public class DistanceListActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Activity displaying list of Stations with relative distances (wrt. current position). This activity is used to display list of Stations with relative distances wrt. current position of the app user. Current location is determined using Google LocationServices API. Location of Stations is obtained from database. In case of missing values, UpdateStationGeoTask is called.
    Author:
    puszkarz
